content.body: Anyone know how to update this site? https://tc39.es/proposal-decorators/ data seems behind
nullvoxpopuli: all of the `tc39.es/proposal-whatever` sites are served from github pages from the corresponding github repo, in this case https://github.com/tc39/proposal-decorators
content.formatted_body: nullvoxpopuli: all of the tc39.es/proposal-whatever sites are served from github pages from the corresponding github repo, in this case https://github.com/tc39/proposal-decorators

content.body: so you could open an issue there
or just send a PR to the gh-pages branch which replaces it with a meta redirect to the spec PR, I guess https://github.com/tc39/ecma262/pull/2417
